about_the_game:
Spooky Dungeon is a fast-paced, retro-inspired dungeon crawler with a Halloween theme and procedurally generated levels. This love letter to the classic games of the 1990s brings together fast-paced combat, challenging bosses, and an engaging story with lots of quests to solve. Every dive into the dungeon is different, filled with terrifying creatures, hidden mysteries, and dark secrets waiting to be uncovered.

ENTER THE DUNGEON

Fight your way through hordes of skeletons, ghosts, and other eerie enemies across several unique biomes, facing down powerful bosses that stand between you and saving the town of Iseholt from its doom. Prepare yourself for a chilling adventure as All Hallows' Eve approaches!

GAME FEATURES

  • 🎃 Retro FPS Aesthetic: A nostalgic visual style that captures the spirit of the 90s with modern refinements.

  • 🗝️ Procedurally Generated Levels: Every dungeon dive is unique. No two runs are the same.

  • 🧟‍♂️ Eerie Enemies: From skeletons and ghosts to corrupted townsfolk, face a wide range of enemies lurking in the shadows.

  • 🗡️ Challenging Bosses: Confront terrifying bosses, each with unique abilities and strategies.

  • 🧙 Powerful Spells: Unlock powerful spells to defeat the onslaught of monsters as you go deeper and deeper into the dungeon.

  • 🎭 Halloween Madness: Immerse yourself in a spooky, Halloween-themed world filled with dark lore, mysterious characters, and chilling quests.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires an Apple processor
  • OS: macOS Sequoia 15.0
  • Processor: Apple M1 or later (Apple Silicon)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB Dedicated Memory
  • Additional Notes: MacBook Air M1 or equivalent
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires an Apple processor
  • OS: macOS Sequoia 15.0 or later
  • Processor: Apple M2 or later (Apple Silicon)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB Dedicated Memory
  • Additional Notes: MacBook Pro M1 or equivalent

  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5, 3rd gen (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 or equivalent

  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 2080 or better
